prompt:
Create a simple 32x32 pixel sprite for a 2D platformer game character representing a mechanical mech pilot. The sprite should be:

- Top-down or side-view perspective for 2D platformer
- Simple geometric shapes and bold colors for easy visibility
- Predominantly metallic colors (grays, blues) with bright accent colors (orange, green)
- Clear silhouette that reads well at small sizes
- Blocky, angular design suggesting mechanical/robotic nature
- Single frame (no animation), idle standing pose
- Transparent background
- Pixel art style with clean, defined edges
- Should look good when scaled up or down in Unity

Style: Retro pixel art, 16-bit era gaming aesthetic, similar to Mega Man X or Metroid sprites but more geometric/mechanical.
